content.detailedDescription: I don't remember the exact date or month. what i do know is it was around summer time and i was 11 years old. i woke up on the loveseat and my dog wanted to go outside. it was about 2am in the morning. i opened the sliding glass door to let her out. i was half awake and i told her to go out. she just sat there sniffing the air. i then looked up and seen the ufo. it was big, cover my whole back yard, house and most of the trees. it was about 2 inches from touching the roof and tree tops. the ufo was the color of an old penny. the top of the ship was oval shape, the bottom was triangle. in the 3 corners of the triangle was 1 dim red light. i just looked at it and froze. i wanted to yell for my parents and i couldn't. i wanted to follow it as it started to drift away slowly over the trees into the woods. yet, i couldn't move. i just shut the sliding glass door. walked back towards the loveseat and realized it was almost 3 something in the morning. i layed on the couch and went back to sleep. the next morning i told my parents and they listened and that was it. i never gave it any more thought. that was until a few years ago. i started having nightmare and remembered that night. what i remember from my nightmares is only some of the puzzel. i remember 11-13 beings, they are about knee/waist height. i didn't see there skin color or body shape. i only seen there glowing yellow eyes. they was in a horizontal line, walking together through the edge of the woods in my backyard towards my house. i was locked outside my house. i couldn't get the sliding glass door open. i was very scared, so i ran towards the front of the house to try the front door. i got halfway there and a white light hit me and i froze and was on the ground. i remember being surrounded at this point but i didn't see the faces or arms nothing. but i was surrounded. this is as far as the story goes. i don't remember anymore. i always questioned god why did this happen to me, i was only 11 years old. i thought about doing hynoises but part of me is scared too. what if they think i am crazy and where does one go to get this done and why good will it do if nothing is done about it? what do you suggest? one other thing that maybe a clue. a few months after this happen i did have an out of body experiance/astral projection.  never had it happen again in my life. any answers or maybe a chat with others to discuss this..Something..
content.summary: I seen 11-13 of the beings, the ship was very big and there was a white light beam.

content.detailedDescription:
My 6 & a half year old son and i were starring up into the night sky from our driveway. we could see the stars very clearly this night. from a north westerly direction we saw a bright white light appear quite high in the sky. it became visible to us once it got past the tree tops that line our yard. 

we were talking about and starring at the stars at the time so when we saw the light we initially assumed it was just a plane, and never really gave it much thought. but then i noticed that this object was moving very smoothly through the sky at quite an unusual speed. not very fast, but not as slow as a low flying plane either. it appeared to 'glide' through the air. that's when i also noticed that it was making no sound at all. none! i immediately paid even more attention to it as it had moved about 5 blocks in distance, well above our heads. it was moving in a straight line and had passed over our heads and was heading toward the okanagan lake. just at that moment an actual airplane had appeared from behind the tree tops on the other side of our yard. we could immediately tell it was a plane from its flashing red/green/white lights, and it made a very distinguishable airplane engine sound. it was flying a fair bit lower than the bright white light. and just as the airplane and bright white light (ufo) were directly in line with each other (the ufo appeared to be a fair bit higher than the plane and was directly above it), the ufo swiftly changed direction and shot up into the sky at around a 75 degree angle, then disappeared in less than a second.

it happened so fast i didn't put it all together in my mind until a few minutes afterward; after we had told my wife and mother-in-law about it. it was then that i fully realized what we just saw. it was a very eery feeling i had after that.
content.summary: Very bright ball of white light that glided slightently at an unusual speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front yard star-gazing with a pair of field-glasses when i noticed a satellite traveling generally south to north at approximately 70 degrees. as i watched it,  a flashing light appeared in that general vacinity of the sky,and although it was still very high up, it was clearly much closer than the satellite i had beeen watching. this light was moving at a fairly high rate of speed, comparable to a jet liner. the light was yellowish and flashed very brightly. this light flashed five times as it moved across the sky, and then it simply stopped flahing, and was no longer visible - this occured on a very clear night, so there was nothing to obstruct my line of sight to the light. within two or three seconds of this flashing light "going off", another light appeared in the same specific area of the sky, but much higher, and travelling at an incredibly high rate of speed. soon after this light appeared it split into two lights and continued at the same relative speed as they angled away from each other. i had to choose to watch one through my field-glasses as they split up, and it was hard to follow as it was moving so quickly - it crossed the sky in no more than 2 seconds; an then faded out of my vision. after the one faded out, i tried to find the other, and could not. but; as i was searching the sky around the area where the first light had faded out, i saw what appeared to be two lights travelling in unison but separated by a considerable distance - these lights were perhaps 100-150 feet high in the sky and were at least hundreds of feet apart. these "two lights" were moving in tandem and were travelling incredibly slowly; just creeping across the sky, and making no apparent noise. it wasn't until i noticed the neighborhood dogs barking like crazy that i noticed a low, but very potent, hum. as i watched these lights, not sure what they were, i realized that the area between these lights was literally blocking out the stars as it moved between them and my perspective. it was huge! the shape appeared triangular, but my perspective and the pure blackness of the object against the black night sky made this difficult to be sure of. this shape travelled slowly across the sky for perhaps three minutes and then vanished, or at least became no longer visible to me.
content.summary: Series of lights and shapes at different altitudes trajectories

content.detailedDescription:
While driving up to disneyland from san diego, going north on i 5, near san clemente i noticed 2 parallel illuminated slits in the sky over the water. i thought they were clouds, but the clouds hept moving, these did not. so while driving i grabbed my canon eos 20d and shot some pictures, but noticed one was gone, the other never left and stayed there until i finally drove away from it, and it went behind some clouds. attached are the pictures. note these pictures are over a 15 minute period. there are many more pictures than these that are full resolution, these submitted pictures are resized for use on the internet.
never saw any movement, i was all by myself, and was driving and when safe would take pictures through my windows.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over ocean near interstate 5 san diego

content.detailedDescription:
Report was writen by dispatch, witness called in at 2242 est
saw same thing last week monday watched for about an 1 hour and 20 minute the time was 9pm

lights red, blue and clear...Appear to be pulsating tonight not much movement, last week alot of rapid irradic movement
was chased by 2 jet fighters from fort braggs army base

movement was like a bumble bee not smooth, irratic movement

witness, her son and her brother witnessed this event

wants to be anonymous
content.summary: Saw red blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: We were awaiting a fireworks display at the annual wine and harvest "grape" festival, when suddenly 3 of these objects appeared. the first took the lead and proceeded from a north-easterly direction moving at a fairly slow nice pace towards the south west, then went west towards the lake michigan direction before slowly disappearing out of sight. after the first one made it's pass through, two others then appeared at closer together distance between each other. one after the other, they followed the same path as the first, as if they were observing the crowd gathered for the fireworks display. others saw it and were remarking, "what is that" it was obvious they were not balloons because of the manner that they were traveling. it was a "no fly" zone area due to the pending fireworks, so that ruled out a plane. they emmitted no noise of any kind. the first passed through shortly before and at the start of the display, while the other two traveled through during the display. it was evident at that time, that they were up much higher and further off from the display area than what it seemed like. the fireworks display had no effect on them and they did not react. it was as though they wanted to be seen as they moved just fast enough to draw attention, but not fast enough to not be noticed. the lights were mostly reddish-orange and were moving in what seemed in a circular motion around the circular ship. the videos i took were zoomed in as far as i could zoom the camera. i used a casio exilim camera.
content.summary: Reddish-orange glowing circular object moving at medium pace from north to south, then went west towards lake michigan

content.detailedDescription:
A totally huge (like the size of several aircraft-carriers) black isoceles triangle totally silent lit on the apex of the angles of the triangle with only yellowish-white lights flew over us at about what appeared to be maybe 1500 foot off the deck.  i could see the mechanical structure of the underside of the triangle from the ambient lights of the city at night.  this thing was huge and made not one sound... it went slowly over us (wife and i both saw this simultaneously) headed east.  it went perhaps a half-mile east very slowly and then banked to the left (north) and accelerated to an incredible speed and disappeared into the night.  this was not a t3-b craft or whatever the military has told us (aurora thing)... no... this was something not from here.  it was totally anti-gravity.  i called the city police and filed a police report; police came out and took the info.

this thing was incredible.  both me and my wife were left totally dumbfounded...  neither of us had seen anything like this ever before or since.

no pix or vids... it happened to fast and unexpectedly.
content.summary: Huge totally silent black isoceles triange starship-like craft

content.detailedDescription:
Discription of event sent on 2005-08-03
drawings newley added 2009-9-23
content.summary: Oval or eliptical shaped. reddish orange glow, two wing tip to wing tip.

content.detailedDescription: I went to lock the patio gate to my apartment around 3.45am when i noticed a very large and very bright object out my patio window. the object was round but not perfectly round and first glanced look like it was a bright twinkling star. i looked closer outside at the object and could observe it flashing different colors "red blue green white". the object looked like it was no more then 10,000 feet up, and about the size of a grape as if held out with arms extended. i woke my wife up out of bed and we both watched the object for good five minutes. she was freaked out and went back to bed wanting no part of what i was watching, but i stayed up and kept observing this thing. i would say a good 20 minutes passed without any movement from the object, however it continued to strobe colors. to my amazement the object vanished and was gone. no movement whatsoever and there was not a cloud in the sky. i want to reiterate the object did not fade out, it vanished! i had a remarkable ufo sighting when i was 12, and the sighting i had on this night gave me the same feelings of excitement and fear combined.
content.summary: Round object very bright flashing red, green, blue and white.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8:30 on september 21 2009 and i was at my friends party. we were about to pick teams for manhunt when out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright light. i asked everybody else around and they all saw it too. i watched for about 15-20 mins with my friends until the cone of light dissappeared gradually until a few remnants of light was still in the sky. it sat in one spot the whole time as if hovering.As soon as i saw it i knew it was a ufo because nothing can make that type of light unless it is a ufo. afterwards us who saw it talked about it and then played manhunt. i didnt realize they enormity of the sightings until the following wednsday i heard others saw it on the radio. i was excited to have actually seen a ufo cause ive dreampt of it and i am now a firm believer but i believed before. none of my friends believe me besides the ones who saw it.
content.summary: Triangular cone of light seen by many people

content.detailedDescription: Strange light spotted over shamokin and witnessed by me and my mother i have been seeing these star light objects over my house now for quite some time and 2 nights ago i seen a very brilliant light setting in one spot over mountain i yelled for my mom and she had seen the same deal i went in to get my binoculars and looked through them at the object it was just all so strange right before that i seen a star light object hovering above my house 20 minutes before it left off a very bright flash and then faded away then as i noticed the one over the mountain it stood in one spot for like 6 minutes and then i watched it move towards us from the other end of town my mom said it was a plain well i decided to watch this bright light as it was moving and when it got closer i could not make it out to be what she said is a plain there was 2 red flashing lights one in the front and one in the back but different then any plain light i ever saw and 2 odd ball light's very different in color and it looked more like a craft of some type no nose and the way it moved was very strange after seeing it 2 day's later someone in the sound off section of the news paper had asked if any one see the strange light over the mountain and that dozes on that side of town had seen it that if anyone seen the same deal as they did see it and what was wrote that the object through off a strong spot light and stayed in one spot i will re-post the the clip thank you,,
content.summary: Saw very bright light over shamokin pa, was reported in news paper.

content.detailedDescription: Our paranormal group was on a bridge doing a paranormal investigation to test our ghost hunting equipment. while filling out our paperwork and had looked up to see weather or not there were any clouds to make note of the weather conditions. one of the spectators that was there watching had said that she had gotten a strange picture with lights behind another spectator. we were trying to determine if maybe it were lightening bugs so, we stood him against the wall of the bridge in the same location to see where the light could have come from. we had looked up to see if we could see lightening bugs and we noticed that there was a large spherical light and a small star behind it. we thaught that it was a plane at first but were wondering what sort of plane would be that large and we couldn't see it's flashing lights on it's wings. it was moving slowly from south to north. it was then that the smaller light, that we thought at first was a star, dropped down, made a "u" and shot straight up rapidly and dissapeared. the larger object quickly shot accross the sky(from south to north) and slowed dramatically. it remained in that location in the sky for about 15 - 20 minutes. it then made a "u" and shot straight up and dissapeared. i looked at the man standing next to me and said "did you see that?" i heard a voice from behind me say "yes, and what the hell was it?" i turned around to see that the entire group (with the exception of one member who was putting up equipment and making notes) had looked up to see what we were looking at and had witnessed the entire event. we were all shocked and were unsure what to make of this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large one and small one large one shot across the sky small one shot upward

content.detailedDescription:
Hiking the high range of the sawtooth mountains west of twisp wa. we approached a pass just below 8,000'. i stopped to take some pictures of my companions from the top as they summited this pass. all five of us saw nothing unusual. my camera got wet on the hike out so i didn't turn it on to download my images for many days so i could make sure it was dry so i only saw the images a few days ago. previewing my images i saw something in one shot over the far ridge that was out of place, zoomed up on it and wow, what looks to me to be a ufo. i���ve been looking and waiting to see a real ufo myself my entire 55 years, this is a first for me. images taken before and after of the same view show nothing.

i am a photographer and use photoshop allot and i know imaging, but i haven���t messed with this image at all other than to zoom up and clip out the ufo section and enhanced the resolution a little, also made a negative out of one of the clips to get and different look. looking closer i became more convinced it was something out there in the sun and was 3 dimensional, not on my lens or a digital blurb. the mid day sun was high behind my left shoulder about 15-20 degrees and looking at the clip the object seems to have highlights and shadows matching the sun's position. it also has what seems to be a dark band around it's middle and a light area (aura if you will) around it, especially under it. 

watching ufo hunters last night online i saw an old sketch made in 1977 of a ufo spotted in brazil, it has many similarities to the one in my image. i have included a screen snap of the sketch.

let me know what you think, am i off track here or do i have a ufo image?

thanks, chris harwood
content.summary: Looking at digital pictures after a hike i saw what looks like a ufo in my image.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting down in basement and i looked out the window and noticed what i at first thought was a plane and then reality set in and realized it could in no way of been a plane because of how bright the lights were flashing and going from side to side as if it was a circular shaped object.  i sat there stunned and while trying to convince myself it was a plane it dropped down real quick (something a plane cannot do)  it kept going along its path and then dissapeared, not behind trees or buildings but just plain dissapeared.  this was a ufo, no doubt in my mind.  i tried convincing myself differently but, it was not possible.
content.summary: Brightly flashing lights that dipped real quick and then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
There was a huge, brilliant bright ufo hovering 500 feet with a probe sticking out to the left of the craft and a dark image below it. it was visible for 2+ hours and moved a total of 1,000 feet west during 2 hours. we watched with our binoculars and night vision goggles. we also saw 4 ufo's (east, west, southwest). they were all identical, pulsating red, green, red, green. they remained stationary, not moved, except the one south of us that went up/down and side to side.
when i looked through normal binoculars, i could see a black spacecraft with 6 lights tilted sideways next to the brilliant bright one. it must have been 1/2 mile long. it would have been camouflaged, but i saw the dense of the black ship as it was solid black and the lights were positioned as a massive ufo.
called the national mufon and told her if a local person came, they could witness something fantastic. the local person didn't call back.
this is the 3rd time in less than a week, but growing in quantity seen and intensity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 ufo's over fort lewis military base (3 were green/red flashing and one bright, large ones)

content.detailedDescription: I was at the af base on a tour for a field trip wuth cap when i asked our tour guides where hanger 18 was. i was joking but the younger officer looked at the older officer who told him, more than me "no." the younger officer smiled at me and said: "you read too many comic books!" later in the tour we were looking at some kc-135's in a real hanger and i and another cadet slipped off. we walked to the hangar next door and went down some stairs( there were just cubicles up top)and were stopped by two guys who put us back with our group. i cant finish this report i have to go now, bye!
content.summary: I saw a landed ufo at wright patterson.

content.detailedDescription:
Was looking up at ursa major from my front porch, when i noticed movement, i thought it was a satellite very dim and high moving from the west to the east at about the speeds most satellites move across the sky. 

suddenly it took a straight 90 degree turn to the south at double the speed it was initially traveling and shot out of sight. i have seen lots of satellites, but how this thing turned on a dime, and increased speed tells me it was no satellite and impossible for anything man made to pull this maneuver. it gave me chills.
content.summary: Satellites don't move like that

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my living room on my couch with the lights all out and had just turned off the tv. i sat there for at least one minute after turning the tv off and saw what appeared to be a very bright light, circle first through the lower windows of my living room and then the upper level windows. i have a high rise vaulted ceiling. i am usually a night owl and i go outside from time to time for a short bit. my first thought was that was really strange especially because i do stay up and had not seen anything like that in this house (lived here almost 4 years). i looked out through the blinds and did not see any vehicles (i did do this immediately after seeing the light) and looked for people who may had been on the sidewalk or for any sign of anything to explain the light. i kind of shrugged my shoulders and thought it was strange and was a spooked but i just couldn't explain it so i sat back down for a moment to gather my thoughts and things that i wanted to bring up to my bedroom. i probably sat there about 3 to 5 more minutes when it happened again and this time it was brighter and circled through the room at least twice, going from all the lower level windows to the upper level back to the lower and then again to the upper. i didn't wait to see what else was to happen and that is when i ran up my stairs to my bedroom. i arrived to the bed panting out of breath and scared. my husband had already gone to sleep so he had no clue as to what had gone on and why i came in the bedroom so frightened. i can guarantee i had not fallen asleep yet and as i've said i tend to stay up late so to see those bright lights was indeed unusual. i can't say for sure that it was a ufo but i did not see anything to explain it and the motion of the lights that circled my living room certainly seem unexplainable. i am very skeptical of the paranormal but i guess when an event can't be explained it's time to admit that it can't be explained.
content.summary: Bright spot light into windows of home

content.detailedDescription:
I was at friends' house for cook-out and quoits. at approximate time soon after sunset when the sky was just becoming totally dark, i looked up at the sky and panned my view to venus. i noticed a light just about thirty degrees down and to the right (two fingerwidths at an armslenth) of venus. i noticed the light because i often look at the sky at night and knew that whatever the light was, it wasn't a regular star or planet or whatever it was. i noticed that the light seemed either stationary or moving at a slow steady pace compaired to venus. i also semi-imedeatly noticed a haze or cloudiness surrounding the light which makes me think that the light was from a craft like a helicopter searchlight, but slow steady motion. by this point in recolecting i alerted a new friend of mine who was standing close by  and we both looked at the light, i said, " man you have got to check this out..."
we looked at the light and at this point (two other friends look and see it as well.  as we all four of us were looking at the light, it changed and the cloudy haze of light seemed to be reorienting itself below the light and formed a cone of white light below the light and then separated into two beams/cones of light and diminished somewhat while the light/source of light seemed to turn up out of view while still the cones of light still dissipating at a slower rate than the light itself. during when the light shifted it seemed to be moving gradually upward very gradually to less gradually until it disapeared. later that night a friend who was riding his bike from easton to bethlehem ( where i was) said that someone called him while he was on his way from easton telling him that 'he had to see what was up in the southern sky...' . he said that four friends in easton saw this light, he saw it and i and three others in bethlehem saw the light and thru comparing stories the light seemed to be coming from due south from easton and south south west from bethlehem. afterward i felt like, "what was that?", "never saw that before", "cool"...

billy hartnett
content.summary: Venus-like, white light with cloud around it changing into light, cloud below then light dissapeard then cloud dissapates

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures of our house to document the exterior work done by a contractor. i picked one window to photograph because there was no sun shining on it. when the pictures came back there was a strange being and another picture of a white cloudlike sphere. there seems to be somekind of writing on the picture also. i did not see anything the day i took those pictures.I have always felt there is some kind of message in the picture.
content.summary: I took a picture and some type of being showed up when it was developed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving down business route 1 in langhorne, pa to go to the local gym. i noticed bright lights in the sky and was curious to what it was so i pulled into the nearby friendly's parking lot. we watched it hover right above our heads about 40 feet in the sky. the object was a small, black, triangular shaped and made no sound. it seemed to pick up gradual speed as it moved in the distance. i was so shocked that i didn't snap a picture till it got farther away. but i do have a picture of the object. apparently several other sightings have been made in the same area and a show called "ufos in bucks county" was featured on the history channel. this just really put things in perspective. i callled the 9-11 and they sent a cop who literally drove by us and acted like he didn't see us i guess to avoid doing a police report.
content.summary: Smaller black triangular shaped object that hovered with red and white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
On 9/21/2009 at approximately 8:40 pm i was driving on south county road 1000 east near mulberry, indiana and i noticed an orange light, about the size of a pencil eraser, in the northern sky. i was driving on a bend in the road at the moment and there were trees to my right so i left sight of it for about 5 seconds. after i made it through the bend and past the trees the light was still there but quickly faded.   i continued to drive on 1000 e for a few minutes and then stopped and stepped out of my car for approximately 10 minutes to make a phone call.  after i was done talking on the phone, approximately 8:52 pm, i saw another orange light in the northern sky, slightly smaller in size to the first.  i was working at the time and  needed to leave the area to head for dayton, indiana.  i was driving for approximately 5 minutes on 900 e.  i stopped at the st rd 38 east and 900 e intersection at about 8:57 pm, i saw yet another orange light, about the size of an pencil eraser in the northern sky.  the light appeared to make a short dart to the south and then faded.  
 
i was very excited and wanted to stay in the area to see if more would appear but i also was very disappointed i couldn't remain in the area to watch to see if the lights were caused by planes as the air traffic that night was very heavy.
content.summary: 3 separate orang balls of light within a 30 minute time frame

content.detailedDescription:
Me, my parents and some friends were travelling in chile, and this day we were walking near the beach in valpara���so, when me and my family stopped to take a photo, after that, i have just looked this photo on the computer and then i noticed this lights.
but when i looked at them i knew they were not strange, because i alreday saw things like that 2 times near my house on the sky, but a few months ago before i sighted this one, and the anothers lights i had sighted on the sky, had 1 ball runnig around the ufo (that i could see), similar this photo, but in this one if you put zoom, you can see 2 black balls around the ufo, anyway, the balls i had saw similar this photo, didnt stay freezed like a rock, they keep moving, running all around the central light but not too fast and not too slow, regular speed, like a magnetic polos, i dont know..
but on this time unfortunately i have just saw the photo, thats it, and sorry for my bad inglish.
content.summary: 6 strange lights

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch facing west enjoying a nice cool evening lots of beautiful stars out. could not figure out what i was looking at but knew it was not a star or an aircraft. i thought that it was a ufo have seen such things before out here in the mountains of west texas. so i went inside to get my wife and my binoculars. my wife took a look in the binoculars and could not explain what it was other than it was stationary in the sky with falshing white lights.  then it took off eastward fairly fast and the light were spinning and flashing then headed southeast out of sight.  at some point the lights flashing were red then white and then maybe a blue or green. i then felt relieved that i was not the only one to see this and that i was not just going crazy. the other sitings i had been alone. watched the object until it could no longer be seen from my backyard.  took some video of the event.
content.summary: Hovered the western sky with white lights then took off fast had rotating light red/ white

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were driving north on 65 @ the county line by peyton creek.  on the left side of the road is dennard mtn.  every christmas a huge glowing cross is set up as a holiday decoration.  last night, at nearly the same spot we saw an enormous oval shaped object (we think it was oval shaped because we think part of it was behind the mountain) with about 8 evenly spaced lights that were brighter than stadium lights. they lit up the trees below.  it looked as if it might be landing.  we could only see an arc type shape, but it looked like half of an egg. we got scared and left. during this time there was a terrible electrical thunderstorm and when we returned home @ around midnight, the object was gone.
content.summary: We were driving up 65 n during an intense thurnderstorm when we saw an enormous object  over the mountain with lights that lit up the trees below.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a smoke.  sounded like an earthquake, or maybe a large missle passing very high overhead.  it def. wasn't any ordinary aircraft, perhaps something big taking one of the world leaders to pa, the craft was traveling south to north which is weird since pa is south.  i'm never going to forget the roar, the very bright red flashing, it was def. different.
content.summary: Bright red very high and very very loud.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for an evening cigarette an i looked out to the town we live outside of to see a mass of 7 or 8 lights very slowly moving from west to east. by the time i had fully grasped what i was seeing my girlfriends mother had came outside and seen the same object i called down for my girlfriend to come see said lights and by the time she had gotten upstairs the lights faded out one by one. i made note that the object was very  very low and move silently
content.summary: A large object made up of 7 or 8 lights

content.detailedDescription: Hello friend; i was on vacation in istanbul,turkey for a month. was taking a pic. of the sunset over the skies of istanbul with my brother,from our balcony at 18:30 hours. the pic.(one)that was taken,at first glance seemed to show the targeted sight and the moon. after a closer look,my husband told me it was not the moon,and thought it was not of this earth. the shape was a perfect sphere,with what we could see with our cave age eye's were two or three belts going around the bottom of it. when the pic. was taken,it was floating at an angle it seemed(compared to the structures in the pic.). it also had kind of a round door hatch on the very bottom of the craft. the outside of the sphere had a very bright,white colored,lace like surface,and as mentioned before,the belts going completely around its' round shape. the belts seemed to represent windows or different levels or floors of the craft. my husband told me,that if we took and set a tripod with a camera out in the balcony and waited for the special shots,we still could not get what we have here. i know this for a fact,....That this craft (as large as it is),was not in my viewing screen of my camera,when i was taking the pic. of the sunset. my husband said,that these crafts are very hard to take pics. of,he thought and to have one frozen in time and space,in a pic.,is almost like a miracle,for our generation of: non believers and believers alike. i would appreciate your feedback on this letter of mine; and if there are possibly a few photo's taken,of the same craft as i described in my letter,(re: the sphere seen in istanbul,turkey). taken anywhere else,i would pls. like to have them confirm the incident,time and place. thx. s.K.       (9.22.09)         -copy-
content.summary: a big sphere;looked like the moon or a planet,at first glance.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a white light in the clouds at 3am in the morning , creating a sunrise effect that eluminated the whole valley, then i saw a red circle about 4 city blocks long going on and off for about two hours, jumping from one side of the road to the next and always out of reach, at this point i had missing time and hours went by , then i came to rockriver and the craft was over the small town, a bright white light came at me and shot past my passanger side window.
content.summary: Red blinking lights 4 city blocks wide in a circle shape, white lights streaming by.

content.detailedDescription: When i was on the way home from my friend's birthday party. i looked out the window and saw a shootong star. i was just dazing off into space. but i kept on staring at it and then i realized it wasn't a star. it was going really fast ne at probably 300 mph. at least! so i kept on looking at it and it was standing still after it was traveling at a fast pace. iwas really scared and i didn't tell anybody because i thought everyone would think i was crazy. now i know that a airplain cannot stay in one spot. so i know what i saw! i have a picture if you want me to mail it to you. just mail me and say either you do or you don't.
content.summary: Loud boom, very clear picture
